subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Rags To Riches, who became only the third filly in history to capture the Belmont Stakes, suffered a hairline fracture to her right front leg on Saturday in finishing second in the Gazelle Stakes.
snippet: Rags To Riches, who became only the third filly in history to capture the Belmont Stakes, suffered a hairline fracture to her right front leg on Saturday in finishing second in the Gazelle Stakes.
